name: Buddy McLean
description: Stand Summon: American Pie. When I am played, choose 2 enemy cards on the field to silence. If there are less than 2 cards to silence, deal 5 damage to the enemy world instead
footer: Ceilings are weird, y'know? They only act to limit us, and stop us from taking flight, and seeing the stars.

stand.name: American Pie
stand.description: Every time an enemy card is silenced, deal 1 damage to a random enemy. This damage is increased by 1 every time an enemy card is silenced

name: Repugnans Fabula
description: Stand Summon: Paradox. When I am played, choose an enemy card on the field to paradoxify. If it is already paradoxified, afflict it with a random paradox. All paradoxes last 1 additional turn.

stand.name: Paradox
stand.description: Whenever an enemy card gets afflicted with a paradox. Make the paradox trigger a second different paradox.

name: Catastrophe
description: Whenever an enemy attacks or targets an ally card, it has a 50% chance of targeting a random enemy instead. If there are no enemies, it targets itself.

name: Rook
description: Stand Summon: Merrie Melodies. When I am hit or attack an enemy for the first time, transform me into 'Ricky Rat'.

stand.name: Merrie Melodies
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, equip me with a random weapon and get a random card from either the enemy's or your deck. All cards that you generate cost 1 less gold.

name: Ricky Rat
description: Stand Summon: Merrie Melodies. When I am defeated, create a 'Rook' in your hand.

stand.name: Merrie Melodies
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, equip me with a random weapon and get a random card from either the enemy's or your deck. All cards that you generate cost 1 less gold.

name: Tyler Wolfe
description: Stand Summon: See You Again. When I am played, choose an enemy with equal or less attack than me to store inside a card. When I am defeated, release the stored enemy.

stand.name: See You Again
stand.description: Store an enemy inside me. I cannot be targeted by ANYTHING.

name: Tommy
description: If all of the 5 Horsemen have been summoned, I gain +5/+5 and all cards on the field, in your hand, and in your deck gain +5/+5.
footer: Ahh! Please don't fire me! I have to provide for...

name: Robert E. O. Speedwagon
description: Stand Summon: Die Young. When I am played, if your world is below 50% HP, equip me with Wild Child. If I am above 50% give me Kesha.
footer: The government shall pay... for my suffering!

stand.name: Die Young
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, grant my user +1/+1 for each HP your world has lost this game.

equipment.name: Wild Child
equipment.description: When my wielder attacks, deal 1 damage to my world to deal 2 damage to the enemy getting attacked.

name: Garnet Speedwagon
description: If I survive for 5 turns, add 'Dionte' in your hand.
footer: 'What is your name? Jolene? That is a pretty name. I had a daugther with that name!' - <Redacted> Months/Years ago

name: Nic
description: Stand Armor: Brittle Bones Nic. When I am summoned, equip me with 'Mop'.
footer: While cleaning may look easy, it would be naive to think that it is always a simple task..

equipment.name: Bone Club
equipment.description: The enemy whom I attacked gets stunned for 1 turn.

name: Niko Goluskey
description: Stand Summon: Rasputin. When I am summoned, choose 1 enemy card on the field to silence. If there are no cards to silence on the field, silence a card in the enemy's hand.
footer: ... What do you need this time?

stand.name: Rasputin
stand.description: Whenever I am summoned, show 2 random cards in the enemy's hand.

name: Darnell Webber
description: When I am summoned, equip me with the 'Tree-90'. If there is an enemy card on the field who is silenced, give me +2/+2.
footer: Shit! I will be late to my honey again!

equipment.name: Tree-90
equipment.description: Whenever my wielder attacks, stun a random enemy on the field for 1 turn.

name: Ace Nullman
description: Stand Summon: American Boy. Deal 2 damage to the enemy world for every enemy card which was silenced or revealed this game. If the enemy world has more than 0 hp, equip omnipotence.
footer: 'The mission is to kill those guys who went after Xeion and Cometon. If you fail, consider yourself --' Cuts off communication. 'You don't tell me what to do... Pretender'

stand.name: American Boy
stand.description: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all silenced enemies on the field

equipment.name: Omnipotence
equipment.description: Transform me into any equipment of your choice.
